synopsis.text:
Once a year, the esteemed Rikkyouin High School selects its future Student Council members through a lottery system, leading to a whirlwind of challenges and surprises for the chosen ones. Enter Chihiro Enomoto, an unsuspecting freshman who suddenly finds himself in the running for the next Student Council President. Alongside his childhood friend, Tokino Akiyama, who lands the Vice-President position, they must successfully complete a grueling one-year apprenticeship under the current council. Failure is not an option, as even the slightest misstep could lead to their immediate expulsion from school.

As Chihiro and his friends navigate through the absurd and unpredictable tasks assigned to them by the ruling body, they encounter everything from homemade robots to domino-stacking terrorists. With the current Student Council President, Ritsuko Kettenkrad, keeping a watchful eye, the gang must rise to the occasion and overcome every obstacle thrown their way. Prepare for a rollercoaster of laughter and suspense in this world-within-a-world anime, as the candidates battle it out to secure their positions in the prestigious student government.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
